version_description:
1. Optimized the overall language translation
2. Optimized gameplay.

Now you can see other players in the village
Click on your own to send message
Melee weapon base damage increased from 4 to 6
All equipment's armor increased from 2 to 3

1. Optimize network links.
2. Optimize game UI for iPhone X.

1.new quiet game mode (do not show other game player, not consumption flow)
2.optimize network link stability
3.repair bug for repeat link network

Endless mode can be quickly selected to the floor
Shield added additional damage reduction effect
Repair the wrong order of equipment in some cases
Fix the problem of attacking in some cases
There is a BOSS in every 100 floor in the endless mo

When repair monster attacks occasionally causes carton's error.
Increasing the drop of gold coins in the deep dungeon.

1. redraw the player and other npc arts resources.
2. strengthening the damage of melee weapons.
